channel.title: Bread on James writes about food

item.title: Loaf tin bread
item.description: Ingredients 450g strong white flour 50g strong brown flour 10g instant yeast 10g salt 325g water Equipment Stand mixer 1kg loaf tin Process Combine ingredients in the bowl of a stand mixer Knead until the dough comes together and feels smooth, about 10 mins Add some olive oil to the bowl, and roll the dough in it to stop it drying out or sticking to the bowl Cover bowl with a tea towel and let rise until it’s doubled in size, around two hours Pour dough out onto a floured work surface, shape into a log Place log into loaf tin, seam side down Cover with a tea towel and let rise for 1 hour.
